Clinical_relevance: Increased metabolism of TCAs to less active compounds compared to normal metabolizers. Lower plasma concentrations of active drug will increase probability of pharmacotherapy failure.
Reccomendations: Avoid tricyclic use due to potential lack of efficacy. Consider alternative drug not metabolized by CYP2D6.
ITA: Possibile riduzione dell'efficacia clinica per abbassamento livelli plasmatici

Clinical_relevance: Clinical effect (S): long-standing discomfort (48-168 hr) without permanent injury e.g. failure of therapy with tricyclic antidepressants, atypical antipsychotic drugs; extrapyramidal side effects; parkinsonism; ADE resulting from increased bioavailability of tricyclic antidepressants, metoprolol, propafenone (central effects e.g. dizziness); INR 4.5-6.0; neutropenia 1.0-1.5x109/l; leucopenia 2.0-3.0x109/l; thrombocytopenia 50-75x109/l.
Reccomendations: Insufficient data to allow calculation of dose adjustment. Select alternative drug (e.g., citalopram,sertraline) or monitor (E-10-hydroxy)amitriptyline plasma concentration.
ITA: Riduzione dell'efficacia clinica

Clinical_relevance: Reduced metabolism of TCAs to less active compounds when compared to normal metabolizers. Higher plasma concentrations of active drug will increase the probability of side effects.
Reccomendations: Consider 25% reduction of recommended starting dose.g Utilize therapeutic drug monitoring to guide dose adjustments.
ITA: Riduzione del 25% della dose raccomandata. Aumento probabilità effetti collaterali

Clinical_relevance: Clinical effect (S): long-standing discomfort (48-168 hr) without permanent injury e.g. failure of therapy with tricyclic antidepressants, atypical antipsychotic drugs; extrapyramidal side effects; parkinsonism; ADE resulting from increased bioavailability of tricyclic antidepressants, metoprolol, propafenone (central effects e.g. dizziness); INR 4.5-6.0; neutropenia 1.0-1.5x109/l; leucopenia 2.0-3.0x109/l; thrombocytopenia 50-75x109/l.
Reccomendations: Insufficient data to allow calculation of dose adjustment. Select alternative drug (e.g., citalopram, sertraline) or adjust dose to clinical response and monitor (O-desmethyl)venlafaxine plasma concentration.
ITA: Possibile aumento degli effetti collaterali

ITA: Possibile aumento degli effetti collaterali

Clinical_relevance: Minor clinical effect (S): QTc prolongation (<450 ms female, <470 ms male); INR increase < 4.5. Kinetic effect (S).
Reccomendations: Be alert to decreased venlafaxine and increased (O-desmethyl)venlafaxine plasma concentration. Titrate dose to a maximum of 150% of the normal dose or select alternative drug (e.g., citalopram, sertraline).
ITA: Possibile riduzione dell'efficacia clinica ed aumento effetto collaterale
